summary: Hi this is my secound mod. Sorry for my bad english. for more information look in the long description
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=5][i]about the mod:
 [/i][/size][/color][size=2]It adds a small new place next to Riverwood (look on the pictures or in the video). When you eneter the door you go into a new place where the ebony warriors brother is waiting for you, fight him and take his epic items.[u]YOU DONT NEED OTHER MODS FOR THIS MOD TO WORK[/u]
  
[color=#ff0000][size=5][i]Some issues:
 [/i][color=#ffffff][size=2]I had some problems with the navmesh (making where the custom npc can walk).
he can walk on the bigger part of the mod but on some parts not. If he gets stuck and cant move, you can just shout (fus ro dah) him.
[color=#ff0000][size=5]
[i]VIDEO:
 [/i][color=#ffffff][size=3]The video is very bad sorry for that. There you can see that i used skyUI in the video, a great mod you should go see it. skyUI is made by: skyUI Team.

[color=#ff0000][size=5][i]My other mods:
 [/i][color=#ffffff][size=3]I have a nother mod called: A new falmer king.

Sorry for my english.[/size][/color][/size][/color][/size][/color][/size][/color]
[/size][/color]

[/size][/color][/size]
author: Nosepicker5
